data.title: Very good meal
data.text: We had a party of 4 for dinner at the Prime Rib Grill on Saturday evening and the place was packed.  You should make reservations on the weekend I would recommend. Our meals each came with their salad/soup bar. The restaurant is nicely appointed, the service was fast and enjoyable, we had 2 filets and 2 prime rib dinners and they were all prepared perfectly. It didn't feel like you were in a casino and we had a very nice time.  We would recommend this restaurant.

data.title: Red Meat
data.text: If you still enjoy rem meat you can cut with you fork this is the place. Its some what on the spendy  but worth every penny

data.title: Very tough prime rib.
data.text: Expected much better after eating at La Strada in the same Hotel...very tough meat!  Service was marginal, waiter didn't come back to check on us but then had a bit of an attitude when we said the meat was tough.  Disappointed but manager lowered our bill to the salad bar price.

data.title: Late evening dinner
data.text: We came in a little late on a Fri, but service was excellent, salad bar was wonderful.  Filet mignon, for the less hearty eater was absolutely delicious, wonderful flavor, tender.  Husband had prime rib, which he also declared excellent

data.title: Great dinner
data.text: We weren't sure what to expect but this was the best restaurant dinner we have had in a LONG time!  The soup and salad bar:  the clam chowder was so good and choices to make your salad were plentiful.    The sirloin steak:  cooked to perfection!   The prime rib:  excellent!  The service:  very attentive.

data.title: Great service and salad bar.
data.text: This offering has a great salad bar but I found the prime rib so-so.  Other eats here are good.  I went for salad bar only this last trip.    Super salad bar!

data.title: Great service, reasonable price
data.text: The Prime Rib Grill has an amazing salad bar that is included with your meal. The steaks are good for the price paid. There is an early bird menu up until 6 PM which was reasonable and had good options. Great table service.

data.title: review
data.text: The food was excellent.Great customer service. The restaurant clean. I would recommend my friends and family to go.

data.title: Great eats
data.text: Beautiful restaurant with wonderful food to eat the prime rib is excellent. It's a pricey restaurant but if you go to a show you'll get half off your meal.

data.title: Dinner
data.text: Ordered a ribeye rare and it came back over cooked ,the service was ok but the steak was not a big rib eye it was thin and a thin steak is hard to cook rare.

owner_response.author: P_Campitelli, F & B Coordinator at The Prime Rib Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Valued Guest,

Thank you very much for taking the time to leave your comments in regards to your dining experience. We work hard to be able to offer exceptional food along with outstanding service and I want to apologize that in this instance, we fell short. I will be sure to pass your feedback on to our entire team as we are constantly using this to improve our services for our guests, such as yourself. We hope that you will give us another chance in the future to host you to a true "Eldorado" dining experience.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Prime Rib melted in my mouth! And the baked potato was done right!
data.text: We came in before the Show, Rock of Ages.  The Prime Rib was just delicious!  The salad bar was super fresh and lots of variety.  Thank you Alex for your patience!  You were wonderful.  The Moscasto was very good too.

data.title: Great Steak and nice salad bar.
data.text: We both had the FILET MIGNON 7 OZ | RED WINE DEMI GLACE SAUCE / 29.95. The filet was cooked to perfection, we ordered Medium Rare. the Wine Sauce is served on the side is wonderful.  I enjoyed the baked potato and my husband had their Garlic Mashed Potatoes, they were to die for.  We also enjoyed the soup (New England Clam Chowder) and the salad buffet.  There was quite a selection at the buffet.  The atmosphere is quite nice. We had wonderful service too.  Would recommend this restaurant for any occasion.

data.title: Best prime rib in town
data.text: Every time we stay at this hotel, have to have dinner at the Prime Rib Grill -- they have early dinners from 5 - 6 PM, where you can get salad or soup from the salad buffet.  Very good wine list too.

data.title: Nice quiet ambiance, great food, great salad bar.
data.text: Took my wife to the Prime Rib Grill, and the quiet atmosphere was perfect for the evening. Food was great and well priced, menu selection was perfect for us. Will definitely be back!

owner_response.author: P_Campitelli, F & B Coordinator at The Prime Rib Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Valued Guest,

Thank you so much for taking the time to leave your positive comments. We work hard to offer exceptional food along with outstanding service and I am elated to hear that you had such an enjoyable dining experience. I will be sure to pass your feedback on to our team, as we look forward to hosting you and yours again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: great eating
data.text: Beautiful Place to eat....the steak was the best ever and we loved the salad bar..would definely go back to eat there again

owner_response.author: P_Campitelli, F & B Coordinator at The Prime Rib Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Valued Guest,

Thank you very much for taking the time to leave your positive comments. We work hard to be able to offer exceptional food and service and I am elated to hear that you had such a wonderful dining experience. I will be sure to pass your feedback on to our team as we look forward to hosting you again soon!

data.title: Prime Rib Grill
data.text:
Mouthwatering  steaks and the best salad bar ever! Hot bread  great wine selection.
I especially  love the hot bacon dressing for my spinach salad

owner_response.author: P_Campitelli, Food & Beverage Coodinator at The Prime Rib Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Valued Guest,

Thank you so much for taking the time to leave your positive comments. I am delighted to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and especially enjoyed our extensive and delicious salad bar. I will pass your feedback on to our team as we look forward to hosting you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent Prime Rib!
data.text: Check to make sure the restaurant is open when you're making your plans (the Casino alternates openings of the restaurants - they are never all open on the same night).  The food here is excellent, as is the service.  Nice little wine list. Will try to make any drink you want. Prices aren't too bad.

owner_response.author: P_Campitelli, Food & Beverage Coordinator at The Prime Rib Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Valued Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to leave your constructive comments. I am so glad that you had an enjoyable experience as we are always working hard to offer exceptional food as well as unparalleled service. Your feedback will be passed along to our team as we look forward to hosting you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wasn't impressed for the price.
data.text:
Late Mother's day date.  Had a room, tickets for the show and dinner at The Prime Rib Grill.  This has the best, best Salad Bar and the Tomato Bisque soup was to die for.  Service was good.
The actual meal was not worth the price.  I had Canadian Lobster, really $55.00??? The lobster was excellent, however the potato a'Gratin was gross and cold.  Which I sent back for some cold Garlic Mashed(I assume the mashed was to be hot).  The Potato A'Gratin was this square brick of potato that tasted like a metal pan, it was dry and cold.  Never seen anything like it.  No flavor, just yuck!  Garlic mashed, no metal taste, but no taste at all.  Sad, especially for the price. If we go back it will be soup and salad bar only.  The Steak my boyfriend had was good.  But he said he has had better.  Way too much money for what we got.  Beware of what you order and how you have it cooked.

owner_response.author: P_Campitelli, Food & Beverage Coordinator at The Prime Rib Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Valued Guest,

Thank you very much for taking the time to leave your constructive comments. We work hard to offer remarkable food as well as service - and we apologize that in this instance we fell short. I will be sure to pass your feedback on to our team and kitchen staff, as we use this to constantly improve our services for our guests such as yourself.
We hope that you will give us another chance in the future to host you and yours and show you a first-rate "Eldorado" dining experience.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great meal
data.text: Had dinner last night at The Prime Rib Grill in the  Eldorado Casino in Reno, Nv with friends. The four of us had a great meal. Prime rib was cooked to perfection and the salmon and scampi were delicious. Staff was very attentive and good.

owner_response.author: P_Campitelli, Food & Beverage Coordinator at The Prime Rib Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Valued Guest,

I wanted to thank you for taking the time to leave your positive comments. I am delighted to hear that you had an enjoyable visit. We work hard to always offer our guests remarkable food along with outstanding service. I will be sure to pass your sentiment on to our team as we look forward to hosting you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: the Best
data.text: The best Prim Rib in all of Reno. Excellent salad bar, fresh and kept that way. Wine and beer selection is above average.
